title: Cylinder Bounds
description: A set of bounds for an implicit cylinder surface. Defines the subsection of the cylinder that the implicit volume actually occupies.

minRadius.description: The minimum radial bound of the cylinder.

maxRadius.description: The maximum radial bound of the cylinder.

minHeight.description: The minimum height bound of the cylinder.

maxHeight.description: The maximum height bound of the cylinder.

minAngle.description: The maximum angular bound of the cylinder in radians. Values must be in the range [-pi, pi].

maxAngle.description: The maximum angular bound of the cylinder in radians. Values must be in the range [-pi, pi].
